name: Clown Snatchers
description:
We're a group of game developer students at Breda University of Applied Sciences who had fun with concepting and creating this game, and we hope you have fun too! 

DISCLAIMER!

There is an obvious bug with our game where the player car floats high above the ground that we've fixed, and you can download it with this link. 

Please, DO NOT play this updated version and vote on it as it would break the rules of the Game Jam! 

We just want people to be able to experience the intended game and have as much fun as we did developing it!
